4161040.itemDesc: Santa Encyclopedia that contains characteristics of Santa.\n#cDouble click on the item to open the book.

4161041.itemDesc: Santa Encyclopedia that contains how to do a good thing for Christmas.\n#cDouble click on the item to open the book.

4161042.itemDesc: Santa Encyclopedia that explains about the Santa village of Finland.\n#cDouble click on the item to open the book.

4161043.itemDesc: Santa Encyclopedia that contains the history of Santa.\n#cDouble click on the item to open the book.

4161047.itemDesc: A guide for Noblesses.\nThe book can be opened by double-clicking on it.

4161048.itemDesc: A guide strictly for the Legends. \nDouble-click the item to open.

4161049.itemDesc: A book that describes the different types of dragons and their characteristics. It appears that there is a second volume as well. \nDouble-click to open the book

4161050.itemDesc: A book that describes the different types of dragons and their characteristics. It appears that there is a first volume as well. \nDouble-click to open the book

4161051.itemDesc: A Voyage Log written by a Crew Member. It's said to contain information about dragons... \nYou can open the book by double-clicking it.

4161052.itemDesc: A guide for Evan. \nYou can open the book by double-clicking on it.

4161053.itemDesc: A guide that has the information on how to obtain the 7th Anniversary Puzzle Pieces. Read this book and you can be a Puzzle King too!

4161079.itemDesc: A guide for Mercedes. \nDouble-click to open it.

4161080.itemDesc: Part of a diary written by Aria. It's full of personal things, but has been damaged to the point that there are only few sections that you can actually read.\nDouble-click on the item to open the book.

4161081.itemDesc: You, too, can become a Mesoranger! A guide that helps anyones with becoming a Mesoranger.

4162000.itemDesc: A diary in which you can read all about the 7th Anniversary event. You can also see how close you are to earning a Joyous 7th Medal and your progress on the Rising Star mission. \nDouble-click to read.

4162001.itemDesc: A book which can be used to check event paricipation status.\r\nDouble-click on it to check your participation, as well as rewards.

4162002.itemDesc: A farming journal in which you can check the number days spent cultivating Tasty Watermelons.\r\nDouble-click on it to check your progress.

4162003.itemDesc: A secret recipe book in which you can check your progress in Special Fruit Sundae crafting.\r\nDouble-click on it to check your participation status and rewards.

4162004.itemDesc: A collection of pirate treasure maps.\r\nDouble-click on it to check your participation status and rewards.

4162005.itemDesc: A book which can be used to check how many Monkey Dolls you have recovered.\r\nDouble-click on it to check your recovery status and rewards.

4162006.itemDesc: A secret guide to making legendary fruit juices. This is just what you need to become a Legendary Fruit Juice Master! You can also record your juice-making triumphs in here.\r\nDouble-click on it to check your current juice-making record.

4162007.itemDesc: A strategy journal that records all the activities of Eco Mapleteers. If you use the Going Green skill once a day, mark it down in this book.\r\nDouble-click on it to check your Eco Mapleteer activity record.

4162008.itemDesc: A monster mop-up journal from the Administrator. You can receive a stamp in it once a day by defeating 200 monsters.\r\nDouble-click on it to check your monster mop-up record and rewards.

4162009.itemDesc: Record your memories from Legends, and make them last forever! By receiving and completing a Making Memories event once a day, your memories will be automatically recorded. Double-click to check.

4162010.itemDesc: A journal for recording your progress in cultivating the Mini Maple Tree.\r\nDouble-click on it to check your progress.

4162011.itemDesc: A journal for recording your progress in growing your very own Christmas Tree. Click on it to open it.

4162012.itemDesc: An application you received from Gaga. Open it up to view a list of events you can partake in for awards.

4162013.itemDesc: A score card for recording your wins and losses from playing Gaga.

4162014.itemDesc: A training journal that records up to 10 days.

4220138.itemDesc: A glass incubator where Mimiana is stored. Drag the food into the incubator to feed Mimiana. Once it matures, take it back to Kiridu the Mount Trainer.

4220148.itemDesc: Drawing paper on which you can draw a portrait of an Orange Mushroom. The portrait of an Orange Mushroom can be completed by using the Amazing, Mystical, or Magical watercolor paint on it. \r\nCan be opened by double-clicking on it with the mouse.

4220149.itemDesc: Drawing paper on which you can draw a portrait of an Octopus. The portrait of an Octupus can be completed by using the Amazing, Mystical, or Magical watercolor paint on it. \r\nCan be opened by double-clicking on it with the mouse.

4220150.itemDesc: Drawing paper on which you can draw a portrait of a Yeti. The portrait of a Yeti can be completed by using the Amazing, Mystical, or Magical watercolor paint on it. \r\nCan be opened by double-clicking on it with the mouse.

4220151.itemDesc: A Hanging Scroll given to you by the Black Wing Shadow Warrior. The erased content can be restored by using special ink.\r\nCan be opened by double-clicking on it with a mouse.

4220152.itemDesc: A sheet of sketch paper that has a rainbow drawing. \r\nYou can open it with your mouse by double-clicking.

4220153.itemDesc: A treasure map given by Kyrin. There are three sections--red, green, and white--that are invisible. The green section should be cleaned first. \r\n\r\n*If you don't need the item anymore, just go to Jack in the Top Floor - Hallway to discard it.#
